pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato channassa upaṭṭhāko gahapati āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.4: Atha kho āyasmā channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagarapūjitaṃ janapadapūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.6: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpessanti gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagarapūjitaṃ janapadapūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.8: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.9: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.10: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpessati gāmapūjitaṃ …pe… raṭṭhapūjitan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.11: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ channaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.12: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, channa, cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṃ …pe… raṭṭhapūjitan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.15: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpessasi gāmapūjitaṃ nigamapūjitaṃ nagarapūjitaṃ janapadapūjitaṃ raṭṭhapūjitaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.19: “Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.20: Tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:1.21: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kāreyya bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya, saṃghādiseso”ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.13: “ahaṃ, bhante, mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.17: Sace sabbo saṃgho ussahati vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ sabbena saṃghena oloketabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.18: No ce sabbo saṃgho ussahati vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.19: ye tattha honti bhikkhū byattā paṭibalā sārambhaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ aparikkamanaṃ jānituṃ te yācitvā sammannitabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.23: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.25: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū sammanneyya itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.28: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kattukāmo sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.30: Saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū sammannati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.31: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṃ sammuti itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.33: Sammatā saṃghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno vihāravatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss7:2.36: Tehi sammatehi bhikkhūhi tattha gantvā vihāravatthu oloketabbaṃ;
